import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create a snapshot</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/v1/snapshotter"}></MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new Kibana snapshot and shares with recipients through email or notification endpoint. Snapshots are stored for 30 days and automatically deleted afterwards.
Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.


## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"snapshotType"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`DASHBOARD`, `VISUALIZATION`]"} schema={{"type":"string","enum":["DASHBOARD","VISUALIZATION"],"description":"The object type to share"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"snapshotSavedObjectId"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"ID of the object to share. If you don't know the object ID, you can use the [/kibana/export](#operation/exportSavedObjects) endpoint.","example":"11f6a669-4f21-6313-dd83-319dbfc8ff96"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"slackWebhookUrls"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"URLs of Slack webhooks that you want to send this snapshot to. <br> At least one of `emails`, `slackWebhookUrls`, and `endpoints` is required with each request. If all three are missing, the request will fail.","example":["https://hooks.slack.com/services/CC29C43F8/7E6E833FB/Ebe297580E7FaC354F9D4d7"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"endpoints"} required={false} schemaName={"int32[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"description":"IDs of notification endpoints that you want to send this snapshot to <br> At least one of `emails`, `slackWebhookUrls`, and `endpoints` is required with each request. If all three are missing, the request will fail."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"emails"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Email addresses that you want to send this snapshot to <br> At least one of `emails`, `slackWebhookUrls`, and `endpoints` is required with each request. If all three are missing, the request will fail."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"message"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Message to send to the shared object recipients","example":"Take a look at these Apache logs, let me know if you want me to do anything about it"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"timeFrameFrom"} required={true} schemaName={"int64"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Starting timedate of the visualization, as a Unix epoch integer.","example":389836800}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"timeFrameTo"} required={true} schemaName={"int64"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Ending timedate of the visualization, as a Unix epoch integer.","example":414720000}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"snapshotTimeZone"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Time zone to use in `timeFrameFrom` and `timeFrameTo`","example":"UTC"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"queryString"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Search query","example":"type:example"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"darkTheme"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"To send the object with Kibana dark theme colors, `true`. Otherwise, `false`."}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

successful operation

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"snapshotId"} required={false} schemaName={"int32"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"ID of the snapshot","example":2049}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"snapshotId\": 2049\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
